sentences.en: One penurious year, my parents used a Swiss cheese plant.
sentences.cn: 在经济拮据的一年, 我父母曾用绳状藤来代替圣诞树.

sentences.en: One penurious year, my parents used Swiss cheese plant.
sentences.cn: 经济拮据的一年, 我父母曾用绳状藤来代替圣诞树.

sentences.en: Raised on a hog farm in Hunan Province, she laughs off the penurious ways of her parents and grandparents.
sentences.cn: 她笑着说起在湖南养猪的父母的吝啬的生活方式。
